Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a 28-ball 53, his second fifty of the tournament.
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs.
India scored 181 for eight, their highest total in the tournament so far.
Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya had a 60-run fifth-wicket stand.
Rashid Khan took 3 wickets for 26 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Skipper Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team’s performance.
A high standard for the rest of the tournament, all of which will be held in the Caribbean, has been set.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had no trouble adapting to conditions in the West Indies.
The move from USA to Barbados was seamless.
The match was held in Bridgetown, Barbados on June 20, 2024.
